    • Uses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.netNeuron

      Subclasses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.netNeuron 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  NetBackNeuron<I>
      A net back neuron is a neuron that can be connected from net front neurons on other processes or machines.
      class  NetFrontNeuron<O>
      A net front neuron is a neuron that connects to a net back neuron on an other process or machine.

    • Uses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.neuron

      Subclasses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.neuron 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Neuron<IO>
      A neuron is a neuronoid with an output function that can be set programmatically.

    • Uses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.neuronoid

      Classes in ch.nolix.system.neuronoid with type parameters of type Neuronoid 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  Neuronoid<N extends Neuronoid<N,I,O>,I,O>
      This class represents a neuron.
      Subclasses of Neuronoid in ch.nolix.system.neuronoid 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      class  BundleNeuron<O>
      A bundle neuron is a neuron whose output is a container of its inputs.
      class  FanoutNeuron<O>
      A fanout neuron is a neuron that: -Has a container of elements as input.
      class  NeuronalNet<IO>
      A neuronal net is a neuron that contains neurons that are connected together to a network.
      class  SourceNeuron<O>
      A source neuron is a neuron that serves as source.
      class  TransformNeuron<I,O>
      A transform neuron is a neuron that transform an input to an output.
